title: What if Zac could absorb allies with his ultimate?
body: Zac got an interesting new ability with his update, but I wonder if instead of just using Zac for his amazing cc, we could also throw some utility into his kit. Ally messed up? No problem. Take them for a ride with your ult and bring them to safety. Or give them a ride to the enemy backline...

replies.body: Let tahm keep his ally movement for him only
Yes because zac is currently not overpowered enough FailFish
Maybe he could grab allies if his ult failed to target an enemy. But then, he would need some tweaks because he's in a really good spot rn.

what if zac's ultimate allowed him to absorb his enemies, spit them out and % true damage and reduce their absorbed enemy's damage by 30% meanwhile Zac becomes the absorbed enemy for 10 seconds and has 200% base stats+total stats. Zac would be the anti-snowball.
I am pretty sure that involuntary movement or placement of allies is something that I would not like to see too much more of and have it be very limited on how it's implemented.
It would require another mini-rework due to how big a buff it would be. Nice idea, though.
